about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of the game Dead Bits, produced by Frost Orb.

Track list:

01 - Frost Orb - Amazing
02 - Frost Orb - Quilly
03 - Frost Orb - Space Travel
04 - Frost Orb - Omega
05 - Frost Orb - Frostbite
06 - Frost Orb - White Days
07 - Frost Orb - Vendaval
08 - Frost Orb - Refresh
09 - Frost Orb - Exploding Bits
10 - Frost Orb - Galaxy Boss
11 - Frost Orb - Ice Cold
12 - Frost Orb - Out of Time
13 - Frost Orb - Jump
14 - Frost Orb - Genius (Dead Bits Theme)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1024 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Dead Bits (Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 (or better)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
